items.sentence: I didn't think that Tom was going to be able to do that.
Do you think that there's a chance that you can do that?
What makes you think that Tom won't know how to do that?
I'd like to thank everybody who helped me get this done.
I want to make sure I'm not overestimating my abilities.
I wouldn't have expected you to say something like that.
Tom was caught on camera holding up a convenience store.
Tom wanted to apologize to Mary, but he didn't know how.
Tom told me that he's planning to ask Mary to marry him.
Tom is likely going to get out of the hospital tomorrow.
Tom is checking his phone to see if he has any messages.
Tom asked Mary what her first French teacher's name was.
If somebody had broken in, the alarm should've gone off.
When was the last time that you and Tom worked together?
Do you really think that I'm the one who should do that?
We're considering various locations for the new airport.
Bomb-sniffing dogs found some explosives at the airport.
The small airport near where I live has only one runway.
You haven't yet done everything you were supposed to do.
I don't think that Tom was the first one to fall asleep.
